SEARCH
Package entity

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NPC, OBJ_Armor, OBJ_Chest, OBJ_Door, OBJ_Potion_Health, OBJ_Potion_Mana, OBJ_Stairs, OBJ_Weapon, Player, shadowStandar
public abstract class Entity extends Object implements Drawable
The abstract base class for all entities in the game. Entities are objects that exist in the game world, such as players, NPCs, monsters, and items.

This class implements the Drawable interface, providing a method for drawing entities on the game panel.
